org.epochx.tools.random
Interface RandomNumberGenerator

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaRandom, MersenneTwisterFast
public interface RandomNumberGenerator

An implementation of this interface is used to generate a stream of numbers with pseudo random qualities, in different data types.

Method Summary
 boolean nextBoolean()
          Get the next boolean value.
 double nextDouble()
          Get the next double in the range 0.0 (inclusive) and 1.0 (exclusive).
 int nextInt()
          Get the next int with the only limits being the bounds of Java's int data type.
 int nextInt(int n)
          Get the next int between 0 (inclusive) and n (exclusive).
 void setSeed(long seed)
          Set the initial seed of the random number generation.
 

Method Detail

nextInt

int nextInt(int n)
Get the next int between 0 (inclusive) and n (exclusive).

Parameters:
n - the upper limit of the generation.
Returns:
the next int in the pseudo random sequence.

nextInt

int nextInt()
Get the next int with the only limits being the bounds of Java's int data type.

Returns:
the next int in the pseudo random sequence.

nextDouble

double nextDouble()
Get the next double in the range 0.0 (inclusive) and 1.0 (exclusive).

Returns:
the next double in the pseudo random sequence.

nextBoolean

boolean nextBoolean()
Get the next boolean value.

Returns:
the next true or false value in the pseudo random sequence.

setSeed

void setSeed(long seed)
Set the initial seed of the random number generation. Two instances of the same implementation of RandomNumberGenerator given the same seed, should produce the same sequence of numbers.

Parameters:
seed - the initial seed.
